prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: The Promptbook ecosystem includes the Book language, Promptbook Engine (for running Book applications), and Promptbook Studio (a web-based editor and runner for Book applications). It also has a community of developers and users, as well as branded social media presence.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Promptbook, ecosystem, Book language, Promptbook Engine, Promptbook Studio, web-based editor, applications, developers, users, social media
